hero.title: About Jamnagar Brass Industries
hero.subtitle: Engineering Excellence Since 2012
hero.description: Jamnagar Brass Industries is a leading precision component manufacturer dedicated to delivering high-quality automotive and pneumatic parts. With advanced manufacturing technologies and a commitment to innovation, we transform complex engineering challenges into precise, reliable solutions.

meta.title: Jamnagar Brass Industries - Precision Manufacturing Excellence
meta.description: Precision component manufacturer specializing in automotive and pneumatic parts with 13 years of engineering expertise and advanced manufacturing capabilities.

items.content: Jamnagar Brass Industries is a leading precision component manufacturer established in 2012, specializing in automotive and pneumatic parts. With a 50,000 sq ft state-of-the-art facility and advanced manufacturing technologies, we deliver high-quality solutions to global automotive and industrial markets.

items.title: Engineering Design
items.description: Comprehensive design and engineering analysis using advanced CAD/CAM technologies

items.title: Material Selection
items.description: Precision brass material sourcing and quality verification

items.title: Precision Manufacturing
items.description: Advanced CNC and semi-automatic machining for complex component production

items.title: Quality Control
items.description: Rigorous dimensional and performance testing using advanced metrology equipment

items.title: Surface Treatment
items.description: Laser marking, deburring, and precision surface finishing

items.title: Packaging & Delivery
items.description: Secure packaging and timely delivery with comprehensive documentation
